readable.title: 549520317_af3d5c32eb
readable.content: A child in a red jacket , sitting atop a slide . A toddler in tan pants and a red hoddie on a slide . Small child in red jacket and khaki pants at the top of a slide with a fence behind . The little boy has a red coat on as he plays outside . The little boy in the red coat and tan pants is at the top of the slide , holding on to the handles of the slide .
